feed.title: Terra Nova (National Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Terra Nova (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:54 PM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -12.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terra Nova National Park 5:30 PM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Temperature: -12.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -15.2°C
Wind: WSW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 16 except temperature steady near minus 10 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 16 except temperature steady near minus 10 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13 except minus 17 in low lying areas. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 13 except minus 17 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.summary: Periods of snow or rain. Windy. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023
